DOC.HEADLINE: BULLFROGS TO FACE PORTLAND IN NEXT ROUND OF PLAYOFFS
DOC.TEXT: The Portland Rage defeated the Calgary Rad ' z in the Northwest Division final Friday , advancing to the Western Conference final of the Roller Hockey International playoffs to play the Bullfrogs . Game 1 of the Western Conference final is Monday in Portland . Game 2 is Tuesday , 7:30 p.m. , at The Pond of Anaheim .
